title: Flair for the Dramatic
album: Carousel (An Examination of the Shadow, Creekflow, and its Life as an Afterthought)
lyrics: Been weighing whether it’s worth it
I think you’ve lost your touch
It’s so easy, it’s a routine stroke
I’ve got a flair for the dramatic
You’ve kept your dirt inside the attic
You’re such a slut! You’re an addict
You let the dream go, you had it!
Still the world needs to see you cry
I’ve got a flair for the dramatic
You’ve kept your dirt inside the attic
You’re such a slut! You’re an addict
You let the dream go, you had it!
